author: jwross
msg: ARIES-931: Applications iTests now run against Equinox 3.8 for the Aries build in order to avoid an intermittent NPE due to an embedded ConcurrentModificationException. The ability to run against 3.5 and 3.7 remains but would need to be enabled and run locally if necessary.

author: torehalset
msg: serialization junit tests for CAY-1741 and CAY-1735
